DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , parallel group , multicenter clinical study evaluate efficacy , safety , pharmacokinetics immunogenicity LBEC0101 compare Enbrel subject active Rheumatoid Arthritis despite Methotrexate therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing LBEC0101 Enbrel® Subjects With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Despite Methotrexate Therapy
